name: Canyon Rush
description:
Your female protagonist will carefully step onto the dangerous courses in her adrenaline-fueled adventure. Balancing on challenging paths and skillfully evading traps is her sole objective. With each attempt, she will encounter a different map and unique course layouts, striving to overcome these changing challenges. As she navigates through the hazardous terrain and overcomes traps, she will bravely and skillfully battle to reach the end. When she falls, she must contend with the perilous giant sandworms lurking beneath the sandy ground, ready to devour her. Canyon Rush offers a unique thrill with its immersive graphics and addictive gameplay. Join Canyon Rush today to break your own records, climb to the top of the leaderboards, and experience the excitement firsthand!

The game is quite simple:
  • Avoid falling onto the sandy ground because giant sandworms are ready to devour you, maintain your balance, and steer clear of traps.
    These traps can lead you to your demise.
  • There's no option to save the game . For Easy Mode ; there are specific checkpoints, while Hard Mode has none.
  • After each death, the character returns to the beginning, unless you've reached a checkpoint (only applicable for Easy Mode), from where you can continue. Now, here's the question: Do you think you can complete the game without dying once?
